long_description: The Michelin Lithion(TM)2 tire offers the look, feel and performance of a true race tire at a price that's tough to beat. 2-tone, silica-based tread is designed for excellent grip and efficiency; twin texture tread is smooth in the center and herringbone on the shoulders. Overlapped, extra-supple 60 tpi casing is reinforced for a comfortable ride and enhanced puncture resistance.
short_description: The Michelin Lithion(TM)2 tire offers the look, feel and performance of a true race tire at a price that's tough to beat.
